alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN COSHOCTON AND WEST CENTRAL TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Killbuck, or 9 miles north of Coshocton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Baltic, Stone Creek, Chili, Blissfield, Layland, and Bakersville. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 71 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
